title: No Place To Update My Phone Number
content:
Fri. 10/20/23 @10:48 pm CDT -- Good evening. As an experienced I.T. Consultant, I cannot find a spot in the Account Profile section or its related pages to UPDATE my phone number. If your system is doing 2FA, it had to be entered at some point. Since I had that old number for almost 10 years, I don't remember what features Firefox had back then. I'd appreciate it if someone would provide an answer. Previous answers I've read today didn't provide one.

Thank you.
creator: jsb3

title: New update deleted all previous restore data
content: This most recent update changed the location of Firefox data, rendering previous shortcuts useless, and all files were also deleted or rewritten completely when I restarted Firefox. All of my tabs are gone, there is no previous restore data, and there is no way for me to recover all of the tabs I previously had. If there is some way to recover my data after this migration it would be greatly appreciated, but if not, this is an incredibly frustrating update with a migration process that seemed unnecessary.
creator: cristian.i.maldo

title: Firefox main account on another device.
content:
What happens is that my account was being used on another device, HDD got broken so im trying to see if i got something synced on the firefox account .

trying to use my account loggin in. it says that I NEED TO USE THE MAIN ACCOUNT??? WHICH ONE???

I CANT LOG IN WITHOUT IT.

AND I CANT USE IT FOR A SECOND ACCOUNT ON THIS NEW ONE.
creator: maxwhiter1253

title: Thunderbird help
content:
I'm not sure I'm in the right place but I have a problem opening my Thunderbird email. It keeps telling me that it's open and to close but nothing happens. I can't close it and it's not actually open. I've rebooted my computer but Thunderbird still insists it's open. What can I do? I can't access and folders or emails. Should I uninstall it and reinstall it? Really hope you can help me

Brice
creator: brice_sf

title: Firefox browser will not display pages within a company's website. This only happens with Firefox.
content:
Firefox browser had failed repeatedly when trying to display sections within 2 websites. I receive "Can not load the page" at Blue Cross and Blue Shield and download freezes the page, site and my computer at a credit card company- requiring end task and complete shut down of computer. This has been occurring for 2 months. I do not have any issue loading these sites or sections via Edge or Chrome. Will this be corrected with the name change? Will there be another browser page that is more reliable?

If not, you don’t need to change your name on Firefox browser. You can just close it down and I will move to Edge or Chrome.

None of your Troubleshooting answers on your Support page covers my situation. I have cleared history, verified settings based on internet articles from others with this issue. Please have someone contact me directly. I’m tired of trying to fix this issue with your browser.
creator: ktbeauf

title: What is the best 'free' VPN add-on from the Mozilla Firefox add-on store?
content:
I'm only looking to use the VPN add-on for a particular movie streaming website where even the website itself advises that you use a VPN connection for security and safety.

I would have the VPN add-on disabled for everything else so I don't need a VPN add-on with lots of bells and whistles, I just want a free VPN add-on that will keep me relatively protected when I use the particular streaming movie website.

Can anybody provide any recommendations or opinions?

I'd rather not sign up to a free trial for a VPN service because obviously the free trial has a cut off date before you actually have to purchase the VPN service and as specified I'm not interested in buying a VPN service.
creator: PocketRocket

title: Disable pop up blocker
content: I cannot access certain email documents because my pop up is blocked. I have tried a number of searches as to where to disable the pop up for firefox but keep hitting dead ends.

title: Firefox not allowing full use of website
content: Firefox is my main browser but it seems like something is blocking full function on a website I need to work with. I can do it using Edge. I want to keep my browser Firefox so how do I clear that up?
